# INCallsDomainHandling

**Protocol**

Provides a convenient way to adopt all of the protocols in the VoIP calling domain.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol INCallsDomainHandling : INSearchCallHistoryIntentHandling, INStartAudioCallIntentHandling, INStartVideoCallIntentHandling
```

```swift
protocol INCallsDomainHandling : INSearchCallHistoryIntentHandling, INStartAudioCallIntentHandling
```

## Overview

The [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INCallsDomainHandling] protocol is a convenience protocol that adopts all of the protocols used to handle call-related intents. When your app adopts all of the protocols associated with call handling, you can adopt this one protocol instead of adopting the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INStartAudioCallIntentHandling], [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INStartVideoCallIntentHandling], and [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSearchCallHistoryIntentHandling] protocols separately.

An object that adopts this protocol must be able to respond to the following intents:

- [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSearchCallHistoryIntent], a request to search for an entry in the appâ€™s call logs.
- [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INStartAudioCallIntent], a request to start an audio-only call.
- [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INStartVideoCallIntent],  a request to start a video call.

Your handler object must be prepared to resolve any parameters associated with these intents and to confirm and handle the requests. When confirming and handling a request, you provide the response object that matches the specified intent.

## Domain-Handling Protocols

- **INMessagesDomainHandling**: An interface for adopting all of the protocols in the messages domain.
- **INNotebookDomainHandling**: An interface for adopting all of the protocols in the lists and notes domain.
- **INWorkoutsDomainHandling**: An interface for adopting all of the protocols in the workouts domain.
- **INPaymentsDomainHandling**: An interface for adopting all of the protocols in the payments domain.
- **INVisualCodeDomainHandling**: An interface for adopting all of the protocols in the visual codes domain.
- **INPhotosDomainHandling**: An interface for adopting all of the protocols in the photos domain.
- **INRidesharingDomainHandling**: An interface for adopting all of the protocols in the ride-booking domain.
- **INCarCommandsDomainHandling**: An interface for adopting all the handling protocols in the car commands domain.
- **INCarPlayDomainHandling**: An interface for adopting all of the protocols in the CarPlay domain.
- **INRadioDomainHandling**: An interface for adopting all of the protocols in the radio domain.

## Inherits From

- INSearchCallHistoryIntentHandling
- INStartAudioCallIntentHandling
- INStartVideoCallIntentHandling
- NSObjectProtocol
